CREATE PRODUCT ships USING 4326;

// DIMENSIONS

CREATE SPATIAL DIMENSION Zone (
	geometry: Geometry
) WITH PROPERTIES (
	cZone Integer DISPLAY_STRING
);

// SENSORS

CREATE SENSOR ShipObservation (
	interval: 300,
	geometry: Point
) WITH PROPERTIES (
	descripcion String
) WITH MEASUREMENT DATA (
	speed Double UNITS "knots/hour" ICON "speed"
) WITH SPATIAL GROUP Zone (
	Zone
) WITH BBOX ([40.42, -3.7], 12);
